comment.author: 27604515@N04
comment._content: The caption is completele wrong. The machine was identified on theaerodrome.com by contributor R. Bailey as De Monge-Buscaylet experimental, 1918. See this link in Dutch language: www.forumeerstewereldoorlog.nl/wiki/index.php/De_Monge_Bu... Also doubtful if this picture has anything to do with German author Heinz J. Nowarra. True is that he collected pictures, but this one needs not to be one of his.
